annotations.title: 10 easy cocktail recipes how to make easy cocktails at home

textContent:
1.5 oz or 45 ml Lagavulin 8
0.75 oz or 22.5 ml Campari
0.75 oz or 22.5 ml Amaro Montenegro

Stir with ice and pour into rocks glass with large ice cube
Garnish with lemon peel
